name: Warehouse Wreckage
description:
This is my second Unreal Engine project, and the first project I completed for Udemy's class: Unreal Engine 5 C++ Developer Learn C++ & Make Video Games (https://www.udemy.com/course/unrealcourse/?src=sac&kw=Unreal).

The goal was to learn Blueprints, the engine's UI, and physics simulation. Features I developed independently include: A splash screen animation made and rendered in Unreal Engine 5, a pause menu, collision sounds, a starting screen, and a HUD.

Link to the repository: https://github.com/RibRob96/WarehouseWreckageProject
